author: Diane Roberts
title: In Florida, we love our beaches. Thanks to our governor, now we can die for them. - The Washington Post

content: The trouble is, Floridas not known for good or safe. This is the state where alligators regularly invade suburban swimming pools, where people get liquored up and compete to see who can toss a dead mullet the farthest, where pastel retirement communities repo… [+6726 chars]
